name: Maze Nuts
description:
Whoever collects the most nuts wins

Chase the golden nut through the always changing maze against up to 3 other players. Use certain strategies to prevent the others catch it before you do. Move the blocks by yourself to find a way to the golden nut or to keep the other player away from it. Collect point to unlock new maps and characters.

Matchmaking

Create a match with 1 to 8 rounds each lasting 3 to 15 minutes. Chose your map size between 9x9 and 11x11 and the difficulty. Search for other player online or just invite your friends.

Single Games

Sliding Maze - Compete with other Steam players and be the fastest.
Static Maze - Get the nut in a given time. If you got it first you will get a reward. The more tries you need the less is your reward in the end.
